title: FS: TOUGH T206 Sweet Caporal 460 Factory 25 Joe Tinker Bat On PSA 4
author: btcarfagno

posts.post_title: FS: TOUGH T206 Sweet Caporal 460 Factory 25 Joe Tinker Bat On PSA 4
posts.post_content:
The toughest of the Sweet Caporals is the 460 factory 25. Almost as tough as the Piedmont 460 factory 42.

[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/collectiblesgains095/tinker1_zps3swkm9fo.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/collectiblesgains095/tinker2_zps8bynoqxm.jpg[/IMG]

Asking ON HOLD delivered

Tom C
I was the underbidder -- didn't realize the rarity of the back -- nice looking card.
